Logging.html#/s:11JacquardSDK09setGlobal.name: setGlobalJacquardSDKLogger(_:)
Logging.html#/s:11JacquardSDK09setGlobal.abstract: Sets the global Logger instance used by all code in Jacquard SDK.

Protocols/Logger.html.name: Logger

Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Describes different types of log messages which can be used to filter which messages are collected.

Classes/PrintLogger.html.abstract: Default Logger implementation that prints messages to the console.

Structs/TouchData.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9.name: Lines
Structs/TouchData.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9.abstract: Describes the touch intensity at 12 points across the Jacquard fabric.

Structs/TouchData.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9.name: sequence
Structs/TouchData.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9.abstract: The sequence number of this touch in a continuous sequence of touches.

Structs/TouchData.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9.name: linesArray
Structs/TouchData.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9.abstract: Convenience accessor returns the 12 UInt8 values in lines in a [UInt8].

Structs/BatteryStatus/ChargingState.html.name: charging
Structs/BatteryStatus/ChargingState.html.abstract: The battery is being charged via the tag’s USB port.

Structs/ContinuousTouchNotificationSubsc.name: Notification
Structs/ContinuousTouchNotificationSubsc.abstract: The response type published when an event is received.

Structs/GestureNotificationSubscription..name: Notification

Structs/BatteryStatusNotificationSubscri.name: Notification
Structs/BatteryStatusNotificationSubscri.abstract: The response type published when a notification is received.

Protocols/NotificationSubscription.html#.name: Notification
Protocols/NotificationSubscription.html#.abstract: The type that will be published every time the appropriate notification is received.

Protocols/NotificationSubscription.html.abstract: Types that implement this protocol describe a notification subscription request and its associated notification body type.

Structs/DisconnectTagCommand.html#/s:11J.name: Response
Structs/DisconnectTagCommand.html#/s:11J.abstract: DisconnectTagCommand response value is Void to indicate success.

Structs/PlayHapticCommand/HapticFrame.ht.name: onMs

Structs/PlayHapticCommand/HapticFrame.ht.name: offMs
Structs/PlayHapticCommand/HapticFrame.ht.abstract: 16 bit val length of off time in msec.

Structs/PlayHapticCommand/HapticFrame.ht.name: repeatNMinusOne
Structs/PlayHapticCommand/HapticFrame.ht.abstract: 8 bit Play symbol N times before next one

Structs/PlayHapticCommand/HapticFrame.ht.name: pattern
Structs/PlayHapticCommand/HapticFrame.ht.abstract: Pattern to play, total 8 patterns are defined.

Structs/PlayHapticCommand/Error.html#/s:.abstract: Throw this error if the component does not support an haptic.

Structs/PlayHapticCommand/Error.html.name: Error
Structs/PlayHapticCommand/Error.html.abstract: Errors that can occur when playing Haptic patterns.

Structs/PlayHapticCommand.html#/s:11Jacq.name: Response
Structs/PlayHapticCommand.html#/s:11Jacq.abstract: PlayHapticCommand response value is an empty Void to indicate success.

Structs/PlayLEDPatternCommand/Frame.html.name: durationMs
Structs/PlayLEDPatternCommand/Frame.html.abstract: Duration for the color to be shown.

Structs/PlayLEDPatternCommand/Error.html.name: componentDoesNotSupportPlayLEDPattern
Structs/PlayLEDPatternCommand/Error.html.abstract: Throw this error if the component does not have an LED.

Structs/PlayLEDPatternCommand.html#/s:11.abstract: PlayLEDPatternCommand response value is an empty Void to indicate success.

Structs/PlayLEDPatternCommand.html#/s:11.abstract: Initializes a PlayLEDPattern command with a custom pattern.

Structs/PlayLEDPatternCommand.html#/s:11.abstract: Initializes a PlayLEDPattern command with a predefined pattern.

Structs/BatteryStatusCommand.html#/s:11J.name: Response
Structs/BatteryStatusCommand.html#/s:11J.abstract: The response type published when the command is successful.

Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.name: errorBadParam
Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.abstract: The parameters to this command were incorrect/invalid.

Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.name: errorBattery
Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.abstract: The device has a critically low battery and will not execute the command.

Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.name: errorHardware
Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.abstract: We have experienced a failure in some hardware component.

Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.name: errorAuth
Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.abstract: The key in an authentication call was incorrect, or there has been

Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.name: errorDeviceTypeInfo
Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.abstract: The device has an invalid device type.

Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.name: errorFlashAccess
Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.abstract: Error accessing Flash for either read/write or erase operation request.

Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.name: errorBusy
Enums/CommandResponseStatus.html#/s:11Ja.abstract: Error Busy - e.g. Busy updating Interposer FW.

Structs/ComponentInfoCommand.html.abstract: Command to request the info of the component like firmware version.

Structs/ComponentInfo.html#/s:11Jacquard.name: version
Structs/ComponentInfo.html#/s:11Jacquard.abstract: Represents the firmware version of the component.

Structs/Google_Jacquard_Protocol_Public_.name: Product
Structs/Google_Jacquard_Protocol_Public_.abstract: Describes the properties of a connected product.

Structs/Google_Jacquard_Protocol_Public_.abstract: Describes the properties of a gear vendor.

Structs/Google_Jacquard_Protocol_Public_.name: touchDataStream
Structs/Google_Jacquard_Protocol_Public_.abstract: This gear supports touch data stream. i.e TouchMode.touchDataStream

Structs/Google_Jacquard_Protocol_Public_.name: GearData
Structs/Google_Jacquard_Protocol_Public_.abstract: This can be used to get configuration data for all vendors and it’s

Protocols/Component.html#/s:11JacquardSD.name: componentID
Protocols/Component.html#/s:11JacquardSD.abstract: The identifier of the current Gear attachment.

Protocols/Component.html#/s:11JacquardSD.name: vendor
Protocols/Component.html#/s:11JacquardSD.abstract: The vendor who manufactured this piece of Gear.

Protocols/Component.html#/s:11JacquardSD.name: capabilities
Protocols/Component.html#/s:11JacquardSD.abstract: The capabilities of this piece of Gear.

Protocols/Component.html.name: Component
Protocols/Component.html.abstract: Type describing an attached piece of Gear.

Components%20and%20Gear.html#/s:11Jacqua.name: GearMetadata
Components%20and%20Gear.html#/s:11Jacqua.abstract: This can be used to describe the capabilities of a piece of Gear.

Enums/SetNameError.html#/s:11JacquardSDK.name: invalidParameter
Enums/SetNameError.html#/s:11JacquardSDK.abstract: Throw this error if the name to be set is not valid or not within the supported range.

Enums/TouchMode.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9To.name: gesture
Enums/TouchMode.html#/s:11JacquardSDK9To.abstract: The tag will interpret touch patterns into discrete Gestures.

Protocols/AdvertisedTag.html#/s:11Jacqua.name: pairingSerialNumber
Protocols/AdvertisedTag.html#/s:11Jacqua.abstract: SerialNumber number used during pairing. Last 4 digit of the UJT serial number.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: namePublisher
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Once the BLE device name is known, this stream will publish immediately on connection, in addition to future updates.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: tagComponent
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Tags have component capabilities (like attached Gear), eg. LED.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: connectedGear
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Publishes a value every time Gear is attached or detached.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: setTouchMode(_:for:)
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Switches attached gear between the different touch modes.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: setName(_:)
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Writes the specified tag name into the connected tag hardware.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: enqueue(_:)
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Send a command, retrying in case of failure.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: enqueue(_:retries:)
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Send a command, retrying in case of failure.

Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.name: registerSubscriptions(_:)
Protocols/ConnectedTag.html#/s:11Jacquar.abstract: Provides access to a SubscribableTag instance, allowing registering tag notification subscriptions.

Protocols/JacquardTag.html#/s:11Jacquard.name: identifier
Protocols/JacquardTag.html#/s:11Jacquard.abstract: Unique identify of the peripheral instance in the current running app on the current iOS

Protocols/JacquardTag.html#/s:11Jacquard.name: displayName
Protocols/JacquardTag.html#/s:11Jacquard.abstract: A human readable string describing the tag.

Protocols/JacquardTag.html.name: JacquardTag
Protocols/JacquardTag.html.abstract: Base protocol for all types of Tag types.

Protocols/SubscribableTag.html.name: SubscribableTag
Protocols/SubscribableTag.html.abstract: The tag type available for subscribing to notifications.

Protocols/AdvertisedTag.html.name: AdvertisedTag
Protocols/AdvertisedTag.html.abstract: The tag type for advertising (but not connected) tags.

Protocols/PreConnectedTag.html.name: PreConnectedTag
Protocols/PreConnectedTag.html.abstract: The tag type for tags already paired earlier.

Tags.html#/s:11JacquardSDK14ConnectableT.name: ConnectableTag
Tags.html#/s:11JacquardSDK14ConnectableT.abstract: The tag type that indicates a tag which is not yet connected or initialized by JacquardManager.

Enums/SetNameError.html.name: SetNameError
Enums/SetNameError.html.abstract: Errors that can occur while setting a name for the tag.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: internalError
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: An error occurred within the SDK code itself.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: malformedResponseError
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: A bad response was read over Bluetooth.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: unknownCoreBluetoothError
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: An unexpected CoreBluetooth response was received, but no error was present.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: bluetoothConnectionError(_:)
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: A CoreBluetooth error was encountered during connection or service/characteristic discovery.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: serviceDiscoveryError
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: An error was encountered attempting to discover the Bluetooth services.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: characteristicDiscoveryError
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: An error was encountered attempting to discover the Bluetooth characteristics.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: jacquardInitializationError(_:)
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: An error was encountered when initializing the Jacquard tag and protocol.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: bluetoothDeviceNotFound
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: The bluetooth peripheral could not be found by Core Bluetooth.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: unconnectableTag
Enums/TagConnectionError.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: An unexpected type of tag was passed into connect(_tag:).

Enums/TagConnectionState.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: preparingToConnect
Enums/TagConnectionState.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: This is initial state, and also the state while waiting for reconnection.

Enums/TagConnectionState.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: connected(_:)
Enums/TagConnectionState.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: Note this is not a terminal state - the stream may bo back to disconnected, and then subsequently reconnect again.

Enums/TagConnectionState.html#/s:11Jacqu.name: disconnected(_:)
Enums/TagConnectionState.html#/s:11Jacqu.abstract: This terminal state will only be reached if reconnecting or retrying is not possible.

Enums/ManagerScanningError.html#/s:11Jac.name: bluetoothUnavailable(_:)
Enums/ManagerScanningError.html#/s:11Jac.abstract: Scanning could not be started because bluetooth is unavailable.

Classes/JacquardManagerImplementation.ht.name: shouldRestoreConnection
Classes/JacquardManagerImplementation.ht.abstract: Callback if peripheral required to restore its connection with device.

Classes/JacquardManagerImplementation.ht.name: init(publishQueue:options:)
Classes/JacquardManagerImplementation.ht.abstract: You should only create one instance of JacquardManagerImplementation.

Classes/JacquardManagerImplementation.ht.name: preConnectedTags()
Classes/JacquardManagerImplementation.ht.abstract: Returns any Jacquard tags already connected with the phone.

Protocols/JacquardManager.html#/s:11Jacq.name: preConnectedTags()
Protocols/JacquardManager.html#/s:11Jacq.abstract: Returns any Jacquard tags already connected to the phone.

Protocols/JacquardManager.html#/s:11Jacq.name: connect(_:)
Protocols/JacquardManager.html#/s:11Jacq.abstract: Connect to a known tag by identifier.

Protocols/JacquardManager.html#/s:11Jacq.name: disconnect(_:)
Protocols/JacquardManager.html#/s:11Jacq.abstract: Disconnect to a known tag by identifier.

Enums/TagConnectionState.html.name: TagConnectionState
Enums/TagConnectionState.html.abstract: The states published by the tag connection publisher.

Enums/TagConnectionError.html.name: TagConnectionError
Enums/TagConnectionError.html.abstract: The errors which can be raised when connecting to a tag.
